name: I Don't Know How to Have Hotpot Alone
name_original: I Don't Know How to Have Hotpot Alone
description:
Move/Interact : Arrow Keys

I was raised in an Asian family, where love is not told and parent's high expectation for a child is a norm. However, I tried to replicate one of my happiest memories of me and my father: when we have a meal together after cram school.

Credits:

Bitsy by Adam Le Doux
Borksy by Ayolland 
Bitsy Hacks by Sean
Add Bitsy Audio by Mark Wonnacott
Paper Napkin (theme song) by Blue Dot Sessions
